abstract: Boko Haram releases video allegedly showing bodies of kidnapped schoolgirls it claimed were killed by Nigerian airstrikes; activists working for girls' release affirm video is likely authentic; militant group, which pledged allegiance to Islamic State in 2015, has apparently split into two factions.

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations

lead_paragraph: A masked, camouflaged fighter who appears in video said many of the abducted girls had died in Nigerian military airstrikes.
snippet: A masked, camouflaged fighter who appears in video said many of the abducted girls had died in Nigerian military airstrikes....

headline.main: Boko Haram Video Appears to Show Bodies of Kidnapped Girls
headline.print_headline: Boko Haram Video Claims to Show Abducted Girls Killed in Airstrikes
